This website is a project for analysis of the Genome Wide Association Studies (GWAS) for Drought Tolerance Using Genome Wide GBS and/or DART in Cassava by EMBRAPA Mandioca.

```{r}
geno <-
  read.table("data/allchrAR08.txt", head = FALSE)

dim(geno)

geno[1:10,1:20]

write.table(geno, "geno.txt")

geno2 <- geno %>%
  select(1, 2, which(geno[1,] %in% names$ID_Clone)) %>%
  janitor::row_to_names(1) %>%
  separate(alleles, c("REF", "ALT"))

geno3<-geno2 %>%
  mutate_at(vars(4:20),  ~ ifelse(.x == REF, 2, ifelse(
    .x == ALT, 0, ifelse(.x != REF |
                           .x != ALT , "NA", 1)
  )))

write.table(geno2,"geno2.txt", col.names = FALSE, row.names = FALSE)

dim(geno)
```
